code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.user;};export var selectCurrentUser=createSelector([selectUser],function(user){return user.currentUser;});export var selectIsLoading=createSelector([selectUser],function(user){return user.isLoading;});export var selectErrMsg=createSelector([selectUser],function(user){return user.errMsg;});export var selectSuccessMsg=createSelector([selectUser],function(user){return user.successMsg;});
